dcterms:description: The changedetection.net dataset provides image sequences and full ground truth for a variety of categories such as static and dynamic background, thermal imaging and camera jitter, as well as the explicit distinction between foreground objects and their shadows.
dcterms:title: changedetection.net dataset

dcterms:description: The SABS dataset provides an artificially rendered scene that allows for very detailed and precise segmentation, overcoming the cumbersome task of hand-segmenting video sequences.
dcterms:title: SABS dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Li

dcterms:description: Various datasets are mentioned that provide video sequences and manually segmented test images for foreground object detection.
dcterms:title: Various datasets

dcterms:creator: H. Hassanpour

dcterms:description: This dataset is referenced as a benchmark for background subtraction techniques, reviewing various methods for video frame background modeling.
dcterms:title: Benchmark for background subtraction
